cast.overview: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.
cast.title: Battle Royale
cast.character: A Girl Who Won Last Battle Royale

details.biography: Ai Iwamura, also known as Aiko Iwamura is a Japanese actress, born on March 4, 1984. Iwamura is best known for her role as Mai in Battle Royale. Iwamura also fulfills some "stand-in" roles as Izumi Kanai, Noriko Nakagawa, Hirono Shimizu, and Haruka Tanizawa. Iwamura also stars as Mai in Battle Royale II: Requiem.
details.name: Ai Iwamura
